text: "Trillionaire" is a song by American rapper Future featuring American rapper YoungBoy Never Broke Again. It was sent to rhythmic contemporary radio on May 26, 2020 as the fifth single from Future's eighth studio album High Off Life (2020). == Composition == Future and NBA YoungBoy sing about their perseverance in rags to riches as well as the hardships they faced on the way. == Charts == {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text- align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2020) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| US Rhythmic (Billboard) | 27 |} == References == Category:2020 singles Category:2020 songs Category:Future (rapper) songs Category:YoungBoy Never Broke Again songs Category:Epic Records singles Category:Songs written by Future (rapper) Category:Songs written by YoungBoy Never Broke Again Category:Trap music songs
title: Trillionaire (Future song)
